General.Name: Walton Advanced Engineering Inc
General.Description: Walton Advanced Engineering, Inc. provides memory assembly and testing services in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers end to end turnkey services, including IC packaging, final test, burn-in for finished goods, and drop shipment for end customers, as well as electrical test and back-end support services. It also engages in the designing, manufacturing, selling, and trading of IC equipment. The company was formerly known as Walsin Advanced Engineering, Inc. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

1.Name: Ms. Jing-Yi  Pan
1.Title: CFO, Chief Corp. Governance Officer, Fin. & Accounting Supervisor and Deputy GM
